description: As a Lecturer in Electronic Engineering, I am actively involved in academic and administrative responsibilities, including leading the study program accreditation taskforce to ensure continuous quality improvement. In addition, I lead and manage several projects, contributing to both institutional development and practical engineering applications.

Terlibat dalam riset dan pengembangan perangkat medis berbasis embedded system, seperti inkubator bayi (PID), autoclave, phototherapy neonatal, dan alat monitoring glukosa & pulse oximeter. Fokus pada desain sistem, pengujian, dan dokumentasi teknis.
